entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning then changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow late in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
